original_title: Smoky Mountain Explorer - Seasons of the Smokies
overview: The second film in the Smoky Mountain Explorer Series, produced by the Great Smoky Mountains Association, Seasons of the Smokies showcases four seasons of life in the Great Smoky Mountains National Park. View astonishing footage of wildlife, wildflowers and vibrant leaves as the seasons change-all in one of the most biologically diverse places in North America.
title: Smoky Mountain Explorer - Seasons of the Smokies
